results.title: The Kiss
results.brief_description: Sue and Bob haven’t had sex in ages, much to the chagrin of Sue (Zoe Carides), but not Bob (Peter Brown), who would rather spend time fixing the car. Bob gets more than he bargained for when his gay, next door neighbour (Hugo Weaving) offers to assist in the car’s repair. (Awards: Winner Best Comedy and Best Score, TropFest Film Festival, 1998)

results.title: Geelong TCUFA : weaving and winding : more than a job : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Five employees of carpet manufacturer Brintons and Textile Clothing and Footwear Union tell about their lives before, during and after working at Brintons. The factory closed in June 2008, leaving 100 people without jobs.

results.title: Why did you leave such a beautiful place?
results.creator_credit: Margaret O'Connell and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Margaret O’Connell tells of how she moved to be with her sister in Geelong, of her first days at Brintons carpet factory and how her loneliness was soon replaced by the family she made there. She join the Equal Opportunity and Consultative Committees and, when the factory closed in 2008, had been there for 32 years.

results.title: The Kiss
results.brief_description: Greta Garbo plays a woman accused of adultery and the murder of her husband. Set with a pre-talkies soundtrack this early film of Garbo’s highlights early European conservatism and the impact of social scandal on a young woman determined to maintain her dignity and freedom to follow true love. This collector’s classic edition of the film also features Garbo career highlights including rare fashion show footage, screen-tests and the star’s arrival in the USA.

results.title: The House of the Dead for Sega Saturn
results.material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM and manual in Sega Saturn case
results.brief_description:
The House of the Dead is console port of the popular arcade shooter. The player, as agent Thomas Rogan or his partner “G” must rescue Rogan’s fiancée Sophie Richards from the evil scientist Dr. Curien and his undead creations.

This release inherits the same a rail shooter mechanic, where the player is guided through a haunted mansion filled with the undead. The player must shoot any enemies before being attacked while also not shooting any hostages. Items that grant health or different upgrades can also be found. The game also has several points where the player can actively affect the course of the game through their actions. For instance, if a player saves a hostage who is about to be thrown from a bridge, that hostage can open a different route through the game.

This port also contains two extra modes called Saturn Mode and Boss Mode. Saturn mode plays like the arcade game, but offers the player different characters to choose from who have varying attributes like reload time and amount of health. The Boss Mode allows the player to fight one boss of their choosing or all of the game’s four boss monsters consecutively.
results.title_for_label: The House of the Dead for Sega Saturn

This release inherits the same a rail shooter mechanic, where the player is guided through a haunted mansion filled with the undead. The player must shoot any enemies before being attacked while also not shooting any hostages. Items that grant health or different upgrades can also be found. The game also has several points where the player can actively affect the course of the game through their actions. For instance, if a player saves a hostage who is about to be thrown from a bridge, that hostage can open a different route through the game.

This port also contains two extra modes called Saturn Mode and Boss Mode. description_for_label:
The House of the Dead is console port of the popular arcade shooter. The player, as agent Thomas Rogan or his partner “G” must rescue Rogan’s fiancée Sophie Richards from the evil scientist Dr. Curien and his undead creations.

This release inherits the same a rail shooter mechanic, where the player is guided through a haunted mansion filled with the undead. The player must shoot any enemies before being attacked while also not shooting any hostages. Items that grant health or different upgrades can also be found. The game also has several points where the player can actively affect the course of the game through their actions. For instance, if a player saves a hostage who is about to be thrown from a bridge, that hostage can open a different route through the game.

This port also contains two extra modes called Saturn Mode and Boss Mode. Saturn mode plays like the arcade game, but offers the player different characters to choose from who have varying attributes like reload time and amount of health. The Boss Mode allows the player to fight one boss of their choosing or all of the game’s four boss monsters consecutively.

results.title: The Journey begins at midnight
results.creator_credit: Joseph Jovic and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Josip tells of his upbringing on a farm in Coatia and how the lure of a better life brought him to Australia, Geelong and, eventually, to Brintons Carpets. Learning English within a few years, Josip soon became a shop steward and a representative on the Consultative Committee and he tells of the closure of Brintons and how it led to his retirement.
results.description: Josip tells of his upbringing on a farm in Coatia and how the lure of a better life brought him to Australia, Geelong and, eventually, to Brintons Carpets. Learning English within a few years, Josip soon became a shop steward and a representative on the Consultative Committee and he tells of the closure of Brintons and how it led to his retirement.

results.title: Emulation of Cricket 96 for DOS
results.brief_description: A sequel to Super International Cricket, Cricket 96 allows the player to set up the field, bowlers and batsmen and play either test or one-day matches. It improved on the graphics of its predecessor and features eight teams, although it forgoes official team or player licensing. However, many of the in-game players have recognizable real-life counterparts, albeit without their actual names.
results.description: A sequel to Super International Cricket, Cricket 96 allows the player to set up the field, bowlers and batsmen and play either test or one-day matches. It improved on the graphics of its predecessor and features eight teams, although it forgoes official team or player licensing. However, many of the in-game players have recognizable real-life counterparts, albeit without their actual names.
description_for_label: A sequel to Super International Cricket, Cricket 96 allows the player to set up the field, bowlers and batsmen and play either test or one-day matches. It improved on the graphics of its predecessor and features eight teams, although it forgoes official team or player licensing. However, many of the in-game players have recognizable real-life counterparts, albeit without their actual names.

results.title: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
results.title_for_label: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
